items.sentence: Tom doesn't think Mary looks like her mother.
I'm sure that a lot of people think that way.
Tom is going to buy himself a new motorcycle.
Tom wasn't ever very good at speaking French.
Tom didn't seem to understand what Mary said.
Tom is afraid of being captured by the enemy.
Tom is obviously devastated by what happened.
I'm not going to leave my house next weekend.
Would you please fax me the application form?
There were no children in the park yesterday.
